ussr.model
Interface PhysicsActuator

All Superinterfaces:
PhysicsEntity
All Known Subinterfaces:
JMEActuator
All Known Implementing Classes:
JMELinearActuator, JMERotationalActuator
public interface PhysicsActuator
extends PhysicsEntity

A physics engine representation of an actuator: can actuate two module components relative to each other. Has sensors to sense its state, and embeds its own controller.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI

Method Summary
 boolean activate(float goalValue)
          Activate this actuator - to go for a particular goal value
